plot: Hikaru Shihoudo is Hikaruon, a metal super hero fighting the forces of the evil organization known as Urael. Disguised as a transfer student, he must investigate a series of strange suicides in town.
opening_theme: "Rekkuu! Gakuen Tokusō Hikaruon - Theme of Hikaruon" by Kumi Kaneko and Akira Kushida
